I'm trying to test an eclipse plugin with JUnit from within eclipse. 
We I =
try to run the test, the plugin I'm testing spits out, invalid
command line=
 input, "-version".

But, I can't seem to find this command line argument a=
nywhere.  It's
not in the run configuration for the test or for the plugin.=
  Where is
this coming from?  How do I get rid of it!?
